lines.gurmukhi: hwir mwnI Jgro imtq ros mwry sY rswien huie pot fwry lwgq n fMfu jg jwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Haari Maanee Jhagaro Mitat Ros Maaray Sai Rasaain Hui , Pot Daaray Laagat N Dandu Jag Jaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Accepting defeat ends all discords. Shedding anger gives much peace. If we discard the results/income of all our deeds/business, we are never taxed. This fact is known to the whole world.

lines.gurmukhi: haumy AiBmwn AsQwn aUcy nwih jlu inmq nvn Ql jlu pihcwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Haoumay Abhimaan Asadaan Oochay Naahi Jalu , Nimat Navan Dal Jalu Pahichaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The heart where ego and pride dwells is like a high ground where no water can accumulate. Lord cannot stay either.

lines.gurmukhi: AMg srbMg qrhr hoq hY crn qw qy crnwmRq crn ryn mwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Ang Sarabang Tarahar Hot Hai Charana , Taa Tay Charanaamrat Charan Rayn Maaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Feet are located at the lowest end of the body. That is why the dust of the feet and the foot wash are regarded sacred and thus respected.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy hir Bgq jgq mY inMmrIBUq jg pg lig msqik prvwnIAY ]288]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Hari Bhagat Jagat Mai Ninmareebhoota , Jag Pag Lagi Masataki Paravaaneeai ?288?

Shabad OS B.translation: So is the devotee and worshipper of God who is sans pride and full of humility. The whole world falls at his feet and consider their forehead blessed. (288)
